입이 고급이라서
쓰레기통도 안 뒤질 텐데
뭐라도 먹고 있기는 할런지
춥지는 않을런지
사람 말이라도 가르칠 걸
이름 목걸이라도 아 걸어줄 걸
집 밖에 나가질 않길래
그저 안심만 했었는데
내 실수였구나
아기와 다름없는 그녀였는데
이 행복에 이 삶에 너무나
익숙해져 살아왔구나
소중한 걸 지킨다는 건
사실 사소한 관심인데
나는 너무 익숙한
내 일상에 이기적이었구나

내 곁으로 돌아와 준다면
널 위해 모든 걸 줄 텐데

미안해 오빠 미안해

entry.title: Musab - What`s A MInk? (MInktro) - 가사
entry.content:
[Verse 1]
I needed nothing, but your frontin', it had me confused
Acting like you got so much more than your minks and shoes
You a model, you an actor, had the lovers singing
Had me wrapped around your thighs, around your little finger
Now I see you in nothing but just an empty shell
Ridin' right up to my life and raising fucking hell
Use me up 'til you had someone there to take my place
Never should've trusted that pretty face

[Chorus]
You got to move
You got to put on your shoes
Act like you're feeling a groove
Cause I ain't your kind of dude
Oh, you mistreat me
You got me more than mad
You're pushing all of my limits, baby
If you leave now I'll be glad

I'd be so happy if you

If you just left me alone girl
You keep coming back for more
You keep coming down to show me
Show me what you got in store


You got a problem

You got to move
You got to put on your shoes
Act like you're feeling a groove
Cause I ain't your kind of dude

You got to move (get out my way girl)
You got to put on your shoes (and get to walking baby)
Act like you're feeling a groove (and put some bounce in your step)
Cause I ain't your kind of dude (I ain't the man for you)

[Verse 2]
If you pointed your phone at her she'd probably stop and pose
At the club all week, she creeps with wings around her nose
Is she heard, is she noticed, is she-is she seen?
The way she walking down the street like she's in Billie Jean
Hope that I spend on me, my family, or my closest friends
Hope time, hope space, hope energy, I guess time is it says
Treat me like an ATM until you reach the limit
I gave you all of my love, but you would just go and spend it

[Chorus]
You got to move (get out my way girl)
You got to put on your shoes (and get to walking baby)
Act like you're feeling a groove (and put some bounce in your step)
Cause I ain't your kind of dude (I ain't the man for you)


You got to move (get out my way girl)
You got to put on your shoes (and get to walking baby)
You're pushing all of my limits, baby
If you leave now I'll be glad

I'd be so happy if you

If you just left me alone girl
You keep coming back for more
You keep coming down to show me
Show me what you got in store

You got a problem

[Outro]
Get you my way girl
And get to walking baby
And put some bounce in your step
I ain't the man for you
